name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters II: Dark Duel Stories
summary: Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters II: Dark duel Stories is a video game for the Game Boy Color, the sequel to Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters. Although the gameplay is still much simpler than the OCG, this game introduced 355 new cards, for a total of 720 (in contrast with the 365 total cards of its predecessor). Trap Cards and Ritual Spell Cards were first included in this game.

alternative_names.name: Yū-Gi-Ō! Deyueru Monsutāzu Tsū: Ankai Kettō-ki
遊☆戯☆王デュエルモンスターズＩＩ　闇界決闘記
